00278     class CloseDocumentEvent : public QCustomEvent{

00386   inline bool areTraceDataAvailable()const {
00387    KURL datUrl(docUrl);
00388    datUrl.setFileName(baseName +".dat");
00389    
00390    QFileInfo datFileInfo = QFileInfo(datUrl.path());   
00391    if(!datFileInfo.exists()) return false;
00392    else return true;
00393   };
